extension.name: Console
extension.description: Provides access to the Symphony core from the command line.

releases.release: - Added check to ensure Console extension is enabled before proceeding. Throws ConsoleException if it isn't enabled (Fixes #4). - Added __toString() method and moved some code from display(). - Removed the login() method since original limitation introduced by Symphony::login() is gone. - Simplified authentication prompt message. - Ran php-cs-fixer over code base to ensure PSR2 compliant formatting.
